transcript:
Customer: client waha pe client agar kar lete to ho jata kya?
Haa.
Hello.
Executive: haa boliye. Good afternoon sir shubham bol raha tha IndiaMART se kaise hain?
Customer: achcha sir boliye.
Executive: haa main uski short bheja tha aapko dekha aapne sir?
Customer: haa boliye.
Executive: to wo sahi hai price unit wo thik hai jo usme dali hui hai mention kari hai jo.
Customer: kya mobile number hai aapka? High karo.
Executive: haa kya keh rahe sir?
Customer: high double karo whatsapp pe dekhne ke liye.
Executive: main abhi ruko ek baar main wapas se high kar raha hu.
Dekhiye maine fir se hello kara abhi aapko.
Customer: haa wo kya kiya hai wo aapne?
Executive: ye jo price jo hamare unit nahi ho rahe the change nahi ho rahe the na usme thik hai?
Customer: hmm.
Executive: to ab ye wale in in product mein ye jo unit unhone mention kari hai wo ho jayenge add ho jayenge usme thik hai aapke hisab se pack ho gaya se jo hai chhe product hai jinme hamara.
Customer: isme mera mera issue nahi hai wo bhai wo mere ko bhej ke kya karoge mere ko kya pata chalta hai usme pack expiry box wo wo to sab rehta hai na pack expiry box.
Executive: nahi to main kya ho raha tha jaise hamara jaise man lo ki hamara ye jo product hai aapka sumit ho sumit 10 ml wala hai thik hai sir ab usme aapka 10 ml ka ek packet hai chota sa thik hai pack hai thik hai.
To usme hum price aa raha hai liter mein mang raha hai wo humse hai na sir price hum liter mein dal nahi pa rahe usme thik hai uske hisab se wo galat price ho ja raha hai to agar isme hum unit pack dal denge.
Customer: haa per pack na wahi na wo sara sab clear kar do abhi kitne product hua khali itna hi hua kya hai?
Executive: nahi ye itne mein hi dikkat aa raha tha na baki to aapka kuch product hai jisme aapka already 1 liter ka quantity tha sir thik hai na jaise aapka ye hoga BS.
Customer: ek do product nahi sare product hai sare lagao kam pe.
Executive: aapka billboard bill wala hai na wo ek uska packaging size 1 kg ka hi hai na aapka to sir to wo okay hai aapka thik hai sir aise hi aapka ye dusra wala hai aapka ye jo BSF fungicide wala hai jo aapka.
Customer: haa hai hai hai.
Executive: ye bhi ye bhi 1 liter mein hai to isme koi dikkat nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: aap aage per piece dalo packing ke aage mere ko option de do khali aap is wala bhi per piece is wala bhi haa.
Customer: haa ye aacrosive ka kya karoge 1 liter ka 920 one liter ka rate hai 9020 rate hai kaise denge hum?
Executive: nahi nahi dekhiye wahi main bol raha hu dekhiye jaha pe jaise hamare ko jo pack hai dekhiye jaha pe 1 liter wala aapka dal sakta hai waha to aapka liter wala accept kar hi raha hai wo to koi dikkat nahi kg and liter to le hi raha hai sir usko thik hai jaha pe hamara packaging chota hai 200 ml ka hai 200 gram ka hai ya fir 50 gram ka ya 5 gram ka hai thik hai waha pe aapka pack ho gaya jaise isme jo unit di thi na bheja tha maine whatsapp usme thik hai abhi jo dale hue hai product mein thik hai unme to jaise man lo box hai to box wala unit aa sakte ho pack dal sakte ho aap jo bottle tha aapka gibberellic acid wala tha five jo 5 ml wala tha sir aapka thik hai usme aap per bottle dala hai maine uska wo 90 correct dikh raha hai na wo.
Executive: hmm sir bilkul abhi abhi jo price dala hua hai na aapka wahi dala hua hai lekin unit galat aa raha hai bas usme thik hai sir price aapne jo diya hai na wo 190 per bottle hai par us unit ko abhi le nahi raha hai accept nahi kar raha hai.
Customer: baki product bhi kare khali 11 product usse kaise business badega.
Executive: nahi nahi main main wahi product hai abhi aapke isme sir jaise abhi next product main product dal deta hu parso dale hue aise product dal deta hu.
Executive: haa aap product add kar dijiye sir main try karunga kyuki ye sare sab mein piece wala to aapka ho hi jae piece to at least sab mein mention kar hi pao agar kuch bhi rahe na thik hai to piece aur ye to aapka rahe hi rahe warna pack aur aapka ye to ho jayega aapka sir thik hai.
To ye aapka aaj matlab kar diya inhone 24 hours mein ye aapka thik ho jayega to abhi bhi incorrect mein dekh raha tha abhi bhi dikh raha hai to wo maine baat ki to kare 24 hours mein ye correct ho jayega update ho jayega aapka usme bina mention bhi waise aapko jo bheja usme mention bhi hai unhone kiya hua hai ki 24 ye changes mein 24 hours mein ho jayega baki main ek unit aapka piece wala kar de raha hu sara matlab try karunga unse baat karunga ki piece kisi mein bhi dal sake aap na yahi keh rahe hai na aap piece main add kar raha hu ruko ek minute.
Executive: haa kariye ek baar zara main line pe hi hu.
Customer: packing size packing size match nahi ho raha liquid mein dal deta plastic bottle mein dal deta.
Executive: haa dekho ek baar aaya kya dekho.
Executive: haa ek minute rukiye abhi search karta hu main.
Executive: haa ye trace sir insecticide 75 ml hai na sir?
Customer: haa.
Executive: haa bottle aa gaya bottle accept kar raha hai na ye wo per bottle dala na aapne sir usme 70 1750 per bottle na.
Hmm haa ye le liya usne ye okay hai aapka.
Executive: abhi abhi haa abhi na teen char product to sir ye thik hai na aapka ho jayega main kara dunga jaise bhi rahega na jaise jaise aapne bola tha I hope matlab ye thik hai jisne jisne bhi aapka discussion hua unhone isko proper handle.
Customer: ye score kaise badhane ka wo log score badhane ke liye bhi bol dete na.
Executive: nahi nahi main bata raha hu main main wo bhi bata raha hu score waise aap score pe kar sakte aapne system ko open kiya na score pe ek baar cursor leke jaiye sir aap apna cursor leke jaiye ki score pe ab yaha pe na checklist open ho ke aa gayi sir usme thik hai ab score mein kya hai sabse pehle.
Customer: score nahi sunna sunna nahi hai wo pata hai mere ko wo jhunjhat wala kam hai wo chhod dete.
Executive: nahi to main kara dunga na sir usme help aage jaise photo ka dikat hai aap hi karao abhi kya haa wahi na aap aap photo add kar do aap aap photo woto add kar do sir thik hai photo woto ka uska size wagera main kara ke kara dunga description wagera main le lunga aapse ya fir aap aap mujhe de dena ya fir main google pe jaise aap bolenge waise main le lunga aap jaise hi batayenge thik hai specification bas aap add kara dena specification wagera.
Executive: thik hai sir?
Customer: haa nahi hoga.
Customer: haa doctor ke aane ke baad bhi phone kar lenge.
Customer: mahalakshmi payment maharaj mahalakshmi payment maharaj.
Customer: sab sab sangit le maharaj.
Customer: haa haa tak maharaj kya karayega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Price unit not updating for some products.

- Wants to know how to increase score.



Resolution:

- Executive updated the unit to piece.

- Executive assured the customer it will be resolved.

- Executive offered help with photo size and description.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. The changes will reflect in 24 hours.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- price, unit, product, score, update
